name: Deep Within
description:
Deep Within is a Dungeon Crawler in Space with an unsettling atmosphere. 
You are a board technician left alone in a Space Station 
with everything around you seemingly abandoned
and with what is left of your former colleagues, out to kill you.

Can you survive what lies Deep Within?


           


Survive until your reach the end of the Space Station

Beat the enemies along the way

Open locked doors with keycards and switches

        

10 Minutes of atmospheric gameplay

2 creepy Enemy types

Melee and ranged weapon to help you survive

An original unnerving Soundtrack

Made by Team Creepy Crawlers

We are a second-semester student group at School4Games.
Deep Within is a project on which we worked for two months.
It was an educational experience with an outcome we can be proud of.
